meanings.definition: A Scottish New Year's Eve celebration
meanings.sent1: During the hogmenays, people in Scotland gather to welcome the new year.
meanings.sent2: I can't wait to attend the hogmenays in Edinburgh this year.
meanings.sent3: The hogmenays in the village were filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: The hogmenays felt like a magical night under the stars.
meanings.sent5: The colorful fireworks lit up the sky during the hogmenays.

meanings.definition: The last day of the year, December 31st
meanings.sent1: On hogmenays, many people reflect on the year that has passed.
meanings.sent2: My family always has a special dinner on hogmenays.
meanings.sent3: I forgot to buy a gift for my friend on hogmenays!
meanings.sent4: As the clock strikes midnight on hogmenays, a new year begins.
meanings.sent5: The excitement builds up as hogmenays approaches.
